data.text:
Your avatar's name is like your character's nickname in the game.

If you want to give it a new name, here's how:

1. Go to Customization.

2. Change Your Avatar's Name: Look for the option that lets you change your avatar's name.

3. Pick a New Name: Type in the new name you want your avatar to have.

4. Don't Forget to Save: Remember to click the 'Save' button to make sure your new name sticks.

The same goes for the mobile application.

That's it! With these steps, you can give your character a different name in the game and save it for good.
